name: Bottoms Up (dgr, ampersands)
description:
A game built for two — but food for one!

Work together to memorize and collect ingredients for recipes. One player controls the platform, while another collects falling food. Don't tip the plate too far or you may slip off. Teamwork is essential to achieve delicious success!

Who is writing these recipes? Where is the food coming from? Why is she so hungry? Only time will tell...
